cast.name: 塔图姆·奥尼尔 Tatum O'Neal
菲利普·P·基恩 Phillip P. Keene

introduction: Charivari was cutting edge, sophisticated and influential, yet largely forgotten. This is their story. CHARIVARI a fashion UPROAR is a documentary film recounting the story of one of America's most influential high-end clothing retailers; from the inspiration for the opening of the first store, how it "grew into a retail mini- empire on the previously fashion-starved Upper West Side of Manhattan", and to all of the ripples and waves it has made in the fashion world up to present day.
